contentrichtext.text: {{about|the village in South Gloucestershire near Bristol|the village in central Gloucestershire near Gloucester|Over, Gloucestershire}} {{Refimprove|date=December 2009}} '''Over''' is a [[village]] in the [[civil parish]] of [[Almondsbury]]<ref>[http://almondsburyparishcouncil.co.uk/ Almondsbury Parish Council website]</ref> in [[South Gloucestershire]], [[England]], situated about 20 km north-west of [[Bristol]]. It lies on the [[B4055 road|B4055]], a road that parallels the [[M5 motorway|M5]] from Junction 17 to 16. The road, known locally as Over Lane, follows the foot of the escarpment which overlooks the [[Severn]] floodplain, whereas the motorway follows the ridge. According to local [[legend]]s, a [[ghost]] of an old woman haunts this town every [[New Year]]'s Eve. Nearby the main [[London]] to [[South Wales]] railway line emerges from [[Patchway]] Tunnel, passes the [[Cattybrook Brickpit|Cattybrook Brickwork]]s, before heading across the Severn floodplain to the [[Severn Tunnel]]. == References == {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline|Over, South Gloucestershire}} {{South Gloucestershire}} {{Coord|51.540|-2.596|display=title|region:GB_type:city}} [[Category:Villages in South Gloucestershire]] {{SouthGloucestershire-geo-stub}}
